page.title: 10Houses in our block
page.content: The houses in our block vary in age. In the centre of Worle there is a very old cottage called the Round House which used to be a toll house.There is also an old house called Maywood House which is going to be demolished.Old Victorian houses were large because they housed big families and servants. They were made out of stones from the local quarry.They had a lot of chimneys because all the bedrooms had fireplaces.Now modern houses are being built in some old houses' gardens and they are smaller.Sometimes the large houses are turned into old peoples homes or flats.Some houses are about 50 years old and are semi- detached.In the last 20 years many new houses have been built. In the area of North Worle nearly all of the houses are modern apart from a few old farm buildings.
